I thought it meant till' all are just one faction. 
That's what Veratis was trying to do.  If that wasn't
it then what did his bio mean by "the legacy of
Prime"?

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> Not only leaders gop to the Matrix, the Matrix was
> made so that one day the 
> hopes and dreams of all those who died for freedom
> and peace with the 
> autobots and decepticons would one day make those
> dreams a reality by 
> lighting the darkest our of their descendants. The

> dead on Canon. Just because

> dimension known as "The

> autobots and decepticons is
